original_text: The herdsmen fled and told it in the city and in the country. And people came to see what it was that had happened.
korean_text: 치던 자들이 도망하여 읍내와 여러 마을에 말하니 사람들이 어떻게 되었는지를 보러 와서

sentences.original_text: and told it in the city and in the country.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성 안과 시골에서 그 일을 전했다

sentences.original_text: what it was that had happened.
